module.description: FOP2 Manager: Allow you to configure FOP2 users, buttons, templates, etc.
module.changelog: *1.1.0* Fix plugin section prompt to fit new alertify syntax *1.0.9* Real time filter in users tab. Updated alertify library. Mass update of button metadata via CSV file. Option to exclude context in multi tenant. *1.0.8* General Settings now available via FOP2 Manager (and not from presence.js). Improved plugin config handlers. *1.0.7* Improved multi tenant support. Add AccountCode advanced field. Fix pagination to not skip last page. *1.0.6* Add pagination to fop2buttons. Fix queue context and park context discovery in freepbx. Use correct state interface in user/device mode. *1.0.5* Add auto answer and originate header advanced fields. Change group and label on the fly on the FOP2 display with no reload. Bugfixes. *1.0.4* Multi Tenant support for Elastix3 and Thirdlane *1.0.3* Add fop2reload action because of asterisk reload bug from asterisk 11.8 and up *1.0.2* Propagate template changes to users with that template assigned *1.0.1* Bug Fixes (use correct context in queue buttons and park buttons in FreePBX) *1.0.0* Stable release
